attributes.action: Have bouncers at night clubs or any security search people for any needles/drugs
attributes.additional_details: The cases of people being spiked in the UK is rising and the government isnt doing much about it. Women and men who are victims to this are sometimes kidnapped and raped. I think that this should come to an end with the government putting in place a law for security at bars and nightclubs to search anyone for needles or drugs. This can help with catching potential rapists and kidnappers before the crime has been committed and would be a huge benefit to those who may not know any signs of being spiked.
attributes.background: Have bouncers and bar security search people for any illegal substances that can be used to spike drinks and people with needles.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598986

You might also like to sign these petitions which call for related actions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599289
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599761
